channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Real Photo Wins AI Photography Contest
item.description: The 1839 Awards disqualified a photo submitted to its AI category after discovering the photographer shot it with a camera.

item.title: The seduction of false promises
item.description: Why do we buy the pitch of the snake oil salesman, the flim-flam man, the con artist, the demagogue or the trickster? As our modern world becomes more...

item.title: PlayStation’s ‘Lego Horizon Adventures’ Somehow Just Makes Sense
item.description: Why didn't the pivot to Lego PlayStation games happen sooner? The good news is that it's happening now.

item.title: Did we give up before AI arrived?
item.description: Plenty of creative pundits are decrying the speed and cost of creating pretty good work with an AI. It can often draw, write and compose as well as a ...

item.title: Vancouver To Host Web Summit 2025: A New Era For The Tech Conference
item.description: Web Summit, the renowned global technology events organization, is introducing a new flagship event in North America, set to take place in Vancouver.

item.title: What spoiled wrecks

item.title: Patrick Kennedy Tackles Mental Health Stigma In Latest Book

item.title: After the emergency

item.title: Apple Debuts Intelligence, Mistral Raises $600 Million, New AI Text-To-Video
